name: oauth2
description: You can finally provision new OAuth 2.0 credentials (also called “OAuth applications”)

fields.name: name
fields.help: The name to associate to the credential. In OAuth 2.0 this would be the application name.

fields.name: client_id
fields.help: You can optionally set your own unique client_id. If missing, the plugin will generate one.

fields.name: client_secret
fields.help: You can optionally set your own unique client_secret. If missing, the plugin will generate one.

fields.name: redirect_uris
fields.help: An array with one or more URLs in your app where users will be sent after authorization (RFC 6742 Section 3.1.2)
